mcq.statement: What does the idiom 'wouldn't be caught dead' imply when someone says they 'wouldn't be caught dead wearing that outfit'?

options.a: They love the outfit and wear it often
options.b: They are afraid of the outfit
options.c: They would never choose to wear that outfit under any circumstances
options.d: They are saving the outfit for a special occasion

mcq.one_liner: The idiom 'wouldn't be caught dead' means someone would never do something, often because it's embarrassing or unappealing to them.
